name: Classic Pound Cake
description: Traditional dense and buttery pound cake with a golden crust.
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, lemon zest (for lemon flavor)
notes: Our traditional pound cake follows a century-old recipe.

name: Marble Pound Cake
description: Beautiful swirls of vanilla and chocolate in a rich pound cake.
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, cocoa powder, chocolate chips (for triple chocolate)
notes: The perfect balance of vanilla and chocolate flavors.

name: Orange Almond Pound Cake
description: Citrus-infused pound cake with toasted almonds and orange glaze.
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, orange zest, orange juice, almond extract, toasted almonds, dried cranberries (for orange cranberry)
notes: A refreshing twist on traditional pound cake with bright citrus flavor.

name: Chocolate Chip Pound Cake
description: Buttery pound cake loaded with chocolate chips throughout.
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, cocoa powder (for double chocolate)
notes: A chocolate lover's dream with chocolate in every bite.
